comments.author: Brendan Dawson

comments.text:
"Tis iz bad cuz, Sum kidz mite git huwt!" Yeah...if you are a sh*tty parent 
they will. What kind of parent doesn't watch their children, monitor or 
restrict their computer access, and/or keep dangerous things like f*cking 
matches and lighters away from children?! Jesus Christ, it's common sense 
to keep knives,matches, and lighters away from small children, if you can't 
do that, then you shouldn't have children. Teens are another matter 
entirely, you can be a bit more lenient with them, just supervise them and 
if they do something stupid and break something, then that's their fault, 
make them pay money for damages, take away privileges, or whatever, they 
are teens. And as far as dangerous things go...what is so dangerous about 
these experiments? None cause hospitalization more than common occurrences. 
You can cut yourself with a knife when preparing food, you can burn your 
hand when cooking, etc.

Some people are strange...﻿
